table.html:
stationary waveprogressive wave
Aall particles vibrate with the same amplitudeall particles vibrate with the same amplitude
Benergy is transferred along the waveenergy is transferred along the wave
Cparticles in adjacent loops vibrate in antiphaseparticles vibrate in phase with their immediate neighbours
Dparticles one wavelength apart vibrate in phaseparticles one wavelength apart vibrate in phase
table.latex: \begin{tabular}{|l|p{4cm}|p{4cm}|} \hline  & stationary wave & progressive wave \\ \hline A & all particles vibrate with the same amplitude & all particles vibrate with the same amplitude \\ \hline B & energy is transferred along the wave & energy is transferred along the wave \\ \hline C & particles in adjacent loops vibrate in antiphase & particles vibrate in phase with their immediate neighbours \\ \hline D & particles one wavelength apart vibrate in phase & particles one wavelength apart vibrate in phase \\ \hline \end{tabular}
